issue.title: [C++][Docs] Typo in in emit_dictionary_deltas documentation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14975](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14975). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Typo in \arrow\cpp\src\arrow\ipc\options.h, in my understanding, it should be emitted, not omitted.

comments.body:
